H0.text: Carried out by a military man it’s called Seppuku. What other name is it known by. Harakiri

H1.text: Carried out by a military man it’s called Seppuku. What other name is it known by. Kaishaku

H2.text: Carried out by a military man it’s called Seppuku. What other name is it known by. Seishi

H3.text: Carried out by a military man it’s called Seppuku. What other name is it known by. 切腹

A4.text: Seppuku (切腹, lit. 'cutting [the] belly'), also called harakiri

A6.text: It was originally reserved for samurai in their code of honor

A7.text: It was also practiced by other Japanese people during the Shōwa era (particularly officers near the end of World War II)
